PropertyValue.Value: select t.operator_id, operatorInfo.Operator_Name, t.station_id, t.device_id, dev.device_name, case when t.status_value = '00' then '登陆' else '登出' end status_value, t.update_date, t.update_time from dev_run_status_detail t left join basi_dev_type_info dev on dev.device_type = subStr(t.device_id, 5, 2) left join priv_operator_info operatorInfo on t.operator_id = operatorInfo.Operator_Id
